text: Motion

Thanks for taking the time to see me Mano.
I'm sorry it's after work.

...N-No, it's fine...
Um, what do you want to talk about...?

Right, we're actually working on a project to have
all of the 283PRO idols do livestreams.

I hope to deliver everyone's charm to more
fans through these streams.
...Howa, livestreams...?

...Um, recently,
a large package arrived at the office...
Motion

Yes, they're the equipments for the streams.
Preparations are steadily underway~
-Exactly, they're for the livestreams.

I've been wondering if I could ask you to do it first.
What do you think?

U-Um...
What kind of things should I do on the livestream?

RIght, I think you could start by introducing
yourself to everyone.

Things you like and what you are interested in now...
Feel free to talk about yourself.

Those who watch it for the first time will get to know you,
while also showing a new side to your existing fans...
I'm hoping we can do those kinds of streams.
Motion

...T-Then
Is it really okay for me to be the first...?
Yeah, I think you're is the right person for the job

For first-time viewers, I also want to convey the
atmosphere of 283PRO itself... or something like that.

I think the atmosphere that you give to those
around you is perfect for conveying such things.

However, I don't want to force you.
Your opinion comes first.

There's no need to decide right away, so I'd be
happy if you could think about it and give me a reply.

...U-Um..
I-I'll do it...
I-I may cause you some trouble, but...

I want to try it...
I wish I could do it...

I see, thank you...!
Don't worry, you'll do just fine.

Since we are here,
Why don't we help Mano-san with the preparations?

That's right
We could test out the microphones today.

With that said...
Mano, do you have the time?

...Y-Yes
It's okay...

Thanks.
It's just a test so just take it easy.
Motion
